Text: thanks man I've been waiting for this, on order at amazon. ur the best

The first track (New Day Dawning) is screwed up -- you can confirm this by looking at the file list for this torrent; there's a PAR2 file for the first track, which means it was damaged. Unfortunately, the PAR2 file does nothing to fix it.
So, the first song does not play at all -- just a heads up to potential downloaders.

However, the other 14 tracks all play fine and are legit, so thanks to the uploader.
Could you please upload the STORM dvd is you have it?
